title: Novo Nordisk to support MIT postdocs working at the intersection of AI and life sciences
summary: MIT's School of Engineering and Novo Nordisk have launched the MIT-Novo Nordisk Artificial Intelligence Postdoctoral Fellows Program. The program will support up to 10 postdocs for a two-year term, providing up to $10 million annually. The focus of the program is to advance the use of AI in life sciences and health, with a strong emphasis on professional development and mentorship opportunities. The program aims to bring together researchers in AI, data science, health, and life sciences to exchange ideas and amplify their impact.
